_instructions.note: PLACEHOLDER CONFIG - Please update after analyzing shot1 v1.mp4
_instructions.howToAnalyze: Open shot1 v1.mp4 in a video player and note:
_instructions.step1: Count how many distinct green screen areas appear in the video
_instructions.step2: For each green screen area, note the frame range (use frame counter or time * fps)
_instructions.step3: Estimate position as percentage of frame: x=0 is left, x=1 is right, y=0 is top, y=1 is bottom
_instructions.step4: Width and height are also percentages (0.5 = 50% of video width/height)
fitModeOptions: cover = fill region, crop if needed
contain = fit inside, may have letterbox
_instructions.exampleCalculation: If green screen appears from 5 seconds to 10 seconds: startFrame = 5 * 24 = 120, endFrame = 10 * 24 = 240
